method: Mix all the ingredients together. Pack into sterilised jars and seal. Store in a cool dark place until you want to use it.
ingredients: 225g/8oz vegetarian suet,  225g/8oz Bramley apples, peeled, cored and chopped,  125g/4oz candied peel, chopped,  225g/8oz sultanas,  225g/8oz raisins,  225g/8oz currants,  175g/6oz demerara sugar,  1 tsp mixed spice,  1 orange, zest and juice,  60ml/2fl oz brandy
